title: Eclose-Badinières
text: Eclose-Badinières () is a <a href="Communes%20of%20France">commune</a> in the <a href="Is%C3%A8re">Isère</a> <a href="Departments%20of%20France">department</a> in southeastern <a href="France">France</a>. It was created in January 2015 by the merger of <a href="Eclose">Eclose</a> and <a href="Badini%C3%A8res">Badinières</a>.
